name: B. Little C Loves 3 II
statement:
Little C loves number very much. He loves all things about it.Now he is
playing a game on a chessboard of size n
times m. The cell in the x-th row and in the y-th column is called
(x,y). Initially, The chessboard is empty. Each time, he places two
chessmen on two different empty cells, the Manhattan distance between
which is exactly 3. The Manhattan distance between two cells (x_i,y_i)
and (x_j,y_j) is defined as |x_i-x_j|+|y_i-y_j|.He want to place as many
chessmen as possible on the chessboard. Please help him find the maximum
number of chessmen he can place.
